info.title: Communitty API Documentation
info.description: This document aims to provide an in-depth guide to consuming communitty's own API

fullName.description: The full display name of the user

userPass.description:
The password of the user.
Must have one uppercase, one number and one symbol with a minimum of eight characters

userMail.description:
The email address of the user.
Must be a valid email address for verification

post.summary: Creates a user using the specified credentials

200.description: `SUCCESS`: User was created successfully. Manual verification is required by the user

400.description:
`ERR_MISSING_BODY_PARAMS`: One or more body parameters are missing. See field `missingProperties`.

`ERR_DUPLICATE_PROPERTIES`: User already exists with either same username or email. See field `duplicateProperties`.

`ERR_INVALID_PROPERTIES`: Properties do not fit the specific criteria, such as invalid characters in name or username. See field `invalidProperties`
